twitter-tag-widget-id: Error: No Twitter Widget ID provided. Please see [[mw:Extension:TwitterTag|usage instructions]].
twitter-tag-href: Error: Unsupported or invalid URL provided. Please see [[mw:Extension:TwitterTag|usage instructions]].
twitter-tag-likes-category-desc: Pages containing embedded Twitter likes timelines. Such timelines [https://twittercommunity.com/t/removing-support-for-embedded-like-collection-and-moment-timelines/150313 will be deprecated] by Twitter at some point.
